eventName: Webinar on Cyber Existence of Professional Skills for a Graduate
description: Join us for an in-depth exploration of how cyber skills can enhance professional development...
guestBio: Dr. Ahsan Habib is a renowned academician and cybersecurity expert with over 20 years of experience in higher education and research. He has guided numerous students and professionals in aligning technical knowledge with career growth.
specialGuest: Dr. Ahmed Al Mansur, Professor and Director, GCiA
specialGuestBio: Dr. Ahmed Al Mansur is the Director of the Green Center for Innovation & Advancement (GCiA) and a respected voice in digital transformation and academic leadership. With a distinguished career spanning more than 25 years, Dr. Mansur has played pivotal roles in research-driven innovation, student skill development, and fostering industry-academic collaboration. His insights into employability, professional growth, and strategic education policy have made lasting impacts across educational institutions.

eventName: IEEE Young Professionals Bangladesh Talk Series 2025
description: IEEE Young Professionals Bangladesh Talk Series is a flagship online talk series aimed at early-career engineers, students, and researchers. The series focuses on professional growth, career planning, leadership, and networking within the IEEE community. This time the talk was held on Emerging Trends on Blockchain Technology to foster learning and make students more aware of recent industry and academia trends.
guestspeakerBio: Amina Saud is a dedicated Lecturer in the Department of Computer Science at Lahore Garrison University, Lahore, Pakistan. With a strong background in computer science education and research, she brings valuable academic insights and professional experience to her students. Her interests include software engineering, data science, and the advancement of technology-driven education in Pakistan.
sessionchair: Professor Dr. Ahsan Habib, Chairperson, Dept. of Computer Science & Engineering, Green University of Bangladesh
sessionchairBio: Dr. Ahsan Habib is a renowned academician and cybersecurity expert with over 20 years of experience in higher education and research. He has guided numerous students and professionals in aligning technical knowledge with career growth. His work focuses on secure system design, ethical hacking, and digital literacy for future graduates. As a key mentor and thought leader at Green University, he is actively involved in bridging the gap between academia and industry.

speakers.name: Amina Saud
speakers.designation: Lecturer, Department of Computer Science, Lahore Garrison University, Lahore, Pakistan

eventName: How Industry-Academia Collaboration Could Benefit CSE Graduates in 2024
description: An insightful seminar exploring the vital connections between industry requirements and academic preparation, focusing on how collaboration can enhance career prospects for Computer Science graduates.
guestBio: Professor Dr. Md. Abdur Razzaque is a distinguished academic leader with extensive research experience in computer science and industry collaboration. His work focuses on bridging the gap between theoretical knowledge and practical industry requirements.
specialGuest: Azmat Iqbal, Sajib Shikder, Md. Rezwan Hossain
specialGuestBio: Industry professionals Azmat Iqbal, Sajib Shikder, and Md. Rezwan Hossain bring valuable insights from the corporate world, sharing their experiences in hiring, training, and developing CSE graduates in professional environments.
eventArea: Green University of Bangladesh, Purbachal American City, Kanchan, Rupganj, Narayanganj, Dhaka

description: A competitive IT Olympiad designed to test students' knowledge in various computer science domains including programming, algorithms, data structures, and problem-solving skills.
guestBio: Experienced faculty members and IT professionals who have designed challenging problems to test students' computational thinking and technical skills.
eventArea: Green University of Bangladesh, Purbachal American City, Kanchan, Rupganj, Narayanganj, Dhaka

eventName: Panel Discussion on How Industry-Academia Collaboration Could Benefit CSE Graduates in 2024
description: An interactive panel discussion featuring industry experts and academic leaders discussing strategies for effective collaboration between universities and technology companies to enhance graduate employability.
guestBio: Md. Abdur Razzaque is a respected academic professional with deep insights into industry-academia collaboration and graduate development programs.
specialGuest: Professor Dr. Md. Golam Samdani Fakir, Professor Dr. Md. Sharif Uddin
specialGuestBio: Professor Dr. Md. Golam Samdani Fakir and Professor Dr. Md. Sharif Uddin are distinguished academics with extensive experience in curriculum development and industry partnerships, bringing valuable perspectives on educational innovation.

eventName: Revolution of Robotics Technology and Artificial Intelligence
description: Explore the cutting-edge developments in robotics and AI technology, understanding their impact on various industries and future career opportunities in these rapidly evolving fields.
guestBio: Prof. Dr. Saifuddin Md. Tareeq is a leading researcher in robotics and artificial intelligence with numerous publications and patents. His expertise spans machine learning, autonomous systems, and intelligent robotics applications.
specialGuestBio: Md. Solaiman Mia is a technology innovator and researcher who has contributed significantly to the practical applications of AI and robotics in various industrial sectors.
eventArea: Green University of Bangladesh, Purbachal American City, Kanchan, Rupganj, Narayanganj, Dhaka

eventName: Career Guideline Workshop on Full-Stack Development with MERN
description: A comprehensive workshop covering MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js (MERN) stack development, providing hands-on experience and career guidance for aspiring full-stack developers.
guestBio: Shohan Ean is a senior full-stack developer with extensive experience in MERN stack development. He has worked on numerous web applications and has a passion for teaching and mentoring aspiring developers.
specialGuestBio: Din Islam is a seasoned software engineer specializing in modern web technologies and full-stack development. His expertise includes scalable web applications and best practices in software development.

description: A comprehensive summit focusing on emerging technologies, innovation strategies, and entrepreneurship opportunities for students and professionals in the tech industry.
guestBio: Dr. Technology Leader is a renowned expert in emerging technologies and innovation management with over 15 years of experience in leading tech companies and startups.
specialGuestBio: Industry Pioneer is a successful entrepreneur and technology visionary who has founded multiple successful tech startups and contributed to significant technological advancements.
